changeSet.author: awallace
changeSet.sql: IF COL_LENGTH('${fffsWebPortalStagingDbStagingSchema}.TIMESERIES_HEADER','TASK_ID') IS NOT NULL EXEC sp_rename '${fffsWebPortalStagingDbStagingSchema}.TIMESERIES_HEADER.TASK_ID', 'TASK_RUN_ID', 'COLUMN';

rollback.sql: IF COL_LENGTH('${fffsWebPortalStagingDbStagingSchema}.TIMESERIES_HEADER','TASK_RUN_ID') IS NOT NULL EXEC sp_rename '${fffsWebPortalStagingDbStagingSchema}.TIMESERIES_HEADER.TASK_RUN_ID', 'TASK_ID', 'COLUMN';
